mapper.select: select bd_date, avg(avg_price) avgPrice from bd_apartment group by bd_date;

select district, avg(total_facilities) total, avg(public_office) office, avg(bank) bank, avg(accomodation) accomodation, avg(supermarket) supermarket, avg(subway_station) subwaystation, avg(bus_stop) busstop from bd_facilities where bd_date = 201708 group by district;
select bd_date, avg(total_floating_population) total, avg(total_male) male, avg(total_female) female from bd_floating_population group by bd_date;
